## Introduction 
- College majors influence income, job security, and workforce representation.
- STEM majors often assumed to have highest salary and lowest unemployment. 
- This project explores **exceptions** and patterns across all fields.

## 1. Dataset

**Dataset:** FiveThirtyEight “College Majors”  
**Source:** [GitHub](https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data/tree/master/college-majors)

- Columns include:
  - `Major`  
  - `Major_category`  
  - `Total`, `Employed`, `Employed_full_time_year_round`  
  - `Unemployed`, `Unemployment_rate`  
  - `Median`  

**Focus**: Salary trends, employment outcomes, graduating class sizes.
